text: Robert Gordon Wilson (16 April 1938 â€“ 25 June 2017) was a Scottish politician and solicitor. He was the leader of the Scottish National Party (SNP) from 1979 to 1990, and was SNP Member of Parliament for Dundee East from 1974 to 1987. He was Rector of the University of Dundee from 1983 to 1986. Wilson died in Edinburgh on 25 June 2017 at the age of 79 from a short illness.Former SNP leader Gordon Wilson dies ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Politicians from Glasgow Category:Scottish National Party MPs
title: Gordon Wilson (Scottish politician)
